docs.snippet: VIENNA, March 1.--One of the cruelest hardships imposed on Vienna Jews is that when they have paid all their taxes and received police permits to leave the country they are unable to go because no country wants them.
docs.lead_paragraph: VIENNA, March 1.--One of the cruelest hardships imposed on Vienna Jews is that when they have paid all their taxes and received police permits to leave the country they are unable to go because no country wants them.
docs.abstract: Intergovernmental Com on Pol Refugees: accepts Reich plan for emigration of Jews

headline.main: VIENNA JAILS JEWS WHO DELAY FLIGHT; Men Unable to Enter Other Countries Are Punished in Concentration Camp GERMAN PLAN ACCEPTED Venezuela Bars 165 Refugees --Chile Saves 68 From Return Trip to Europe German Plan Is Accepted 68 Get Haven in Chile Venezuela Bars 165 Guatemala Limits Entry

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, March 1.--At 2 o'clock this afternoon Brazil accorded de facto recognition to Generalissimo Francisco Franco's government in Spain, and Jose Carcer y Lassance, who has been representing General Franco here, automatically...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, March 1.--At 2 o'clock this afternoon Brazil accorded de facto recognition to Generalissimo Francisco Franco's government in Spain, and Jose Carcer y Lassance, who has been representing General Franco here, automatically became its recognized diplomatic representative.

docs.snippet: BERLIN, March 3.--Execution of the Evian plan for orderly emigration of Jews from Germany was believed assured today.
docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, March 3.--Execution of the Evian plan for orderly emigration of Jews from Germany was believed assured today.
